articles.author: Ryan Hogg
articles.title: The U.K. economy could stare down long-term irrelevance without immigration - Fortune
articles.description: The U.K. is expected to grow more slowly than most of the world's developed nations this year, but it can save itself in the long run.
articles.content: The U.K. economy is running out of places to look for a good news story as its economy continues to deal with inflation while its neighbors in Europe leave rising prices in the rearview. Now its like… [+4049 chars]
